biotools.summary: Biomolecular Reaction and Interaction Dynamics Global Environment (BRIDGE) is an open-source web platform developed with the aim to provide an environment for the design of reliable methods to conduct reproducible biomolecular simulations. It is built on the well-known Galaxy bioinformatics platform. Through this, BRIDGE hosts computational chemistry tools on public web servers for internet use and provides machine- and operating-system-independent portability using the Docker container platform for local use.

bioschemas.name: BRIDGE
